metadata.name: Beyond Death's Door
metadata.description:
A journey through death and rebirth  
A tale of love, loss, and mirth

A man who once lived and breathed  
Now walks among the living, wreathed

In bones and whispers of the past  
His second chance will forever last

In this new form, he sees the light  
Of all that living life can ignite

A spark of hope, a glimmer of grace  
A reminder to never give up the chase

For the universe holds endless treasure  
And life, a true and boundless pleasure.
